title: Pre-Start
description: Laying the foundations, setting up the business, and preparing for the first client.

title: Client Acquisition
description: Focusing on marketing, lead generation, and initial client engagement.

title: Application
description: The core process of gathering data, documents, and submitting loan applications.

title: Settlement
description: Managing the final stages of the loan process through to successful settlement.

title: Post-Settlement
description: Following up with clients after settlement to ensure satisfaction and ongoing support.

title: Ongoing
description: Managing long-term client relationships and regular reviews.

title: Ninja-Mode
description: Advanced automation and scaling for high-performing brokerage businesses.
